attributes.action: Make the harrassment of non-vegans illegal in the UK
attributes.background: Vegans have every right to be vegan. They do not have the right to bully others into giving up animal products. Some people really enjoy eating meat, poultry, fish etc and using animal products. We have as much right to be non-vegan as they do to be vegan. Stop the harrassment of non-vegans

rejection.details:
There are already laws against harrassment. It is therefore not clear what additional action you would like the Government or Parliament to take.

You can find out more about harrassment law here:

https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/discrimination/taking-action-about-discrimination/taking-action-about-harassment/
